system.description:
Also at 1st level, you gain the ability to infuse your brew with healing energies. You may turn a number of bottles of beer, mead, spirits, or wine equal to your proficiency bonus into a @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.yla4i7uz4h58mfqb]{Healing Potion (Basic)} per day. The process to bless the beverage in this way takes 10 minutes, and it may be done as part of a short or a long rest. These potions cannot be sold and last for 24 hours, at which point they turn into bitter vinegar.

These potions may be @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.nees9nzonritxzwe]{Healing Potions (Greater)} starting at 6th level, and @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.3gmfg4fsi8abv1ej]{Healing Potions (Superior)} beginning at 12th level.
